transcript:
Customer: [Music]
Customer: Hello
Executive: Namaste sir very good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Sir main Roshan baat kar raha hun Nikki ka manager India Mart office se kaise hain aap?
Customer: India Mart?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan boliye sir boliye sir maje mein hai.
Executive: Actually sir abhi aapki Nikki se baat hui thi aaj.
Customer: Ho ho ho.
Executive: Right uske baad aapke paas wo feedback ke liye gaya tha aapne not satisfied ka feedback diya hai to just wanted to know ki matlab.
Customer: Are wo not not satisfied hai na wo galti se gaya sir satisfied pehle satisfied dala hai na wo double bar button click ho gaya.
Executive: Achcha achcha wo galti se gaya.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai koi problem nahi hai sir baki services ke bare mein aap mujhe bataye services kaise chal rahi hai kahin services mein koi dikkat.
Customer: Sir pehle jo order aapka slow tha na pehla isse pehle thi ye package tha isko pehle ka jo tha to wo bahut achcha tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Isme jyada kuch order nahi mil rahe.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To abhi sir main dekh raha hun aapke profile mein bahut sara product hai jo aapne out of stock mark karke rakha hua hai aapki by lead consumption wagera pehle se kam hui hai aapki matlab package ke sath mein badhi nahi hai.
Customer: Are suniye na mere paas jo jo auto maine dal ke rakhe hue hain sir uske paas iske jo uski to ye hai kya bolte hai uski jo requirement aane ko hona wo requirement nahi aa rahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan to aana kuch hoga to wo wo requirement apan uthate bhi nahi hai na kyuki mere kaam ki nahi hai to main usko kyu uthau.
Executive: Koi baat nahi wo to main samajh gaya aap sir ek cheez bataye ek to na do teen cheezon ki requirement hai aapke profile mein total kuch product aise hain jinke images wagera sirf ek ek dali hui hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek product aisa hai jiska price galat dala hua hai.
Customer: To Nikki madam ne abhi bataya mere ko abhi phone aaya tha.
Executive: Haan to ek bari aap online aa jaye sir hum isko update kar dete hain ya aap hame detail share kar de hum update kar dete hain dusri cheez aap suniye na.
Customer: Hmm Nikki se baat ho gayi hai unhone mangaya hai mere se photo.
Executive: Ji ji abhi sir ek just by lead aayi hui hai electrical panel lock and key ka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek bari aap open karenge please apna application.
Customer: Haan haan ek minute abhi just ek by lead aayi hui hai recent pe click kariyega.
Customer: Haan wo single point lock na.
Executive: Electrical panel lock and key ka recent pe click kijiye ga sir aapne relevant pe click kara hoga recent upar mein recent aur relevant hoga recent pe click kijiye ga.
Customer: Haan hai hai hai gujarat ka hai.
Executive: Haan to ye by lead consume kijiye.
Customer: Sir suniye na isme stainless steel aur brass aisa likha hua hai.
Executive: Haan to aapko stainless steel ka chahiye na product.
Customer: Nahi apan aluminium mein lock supply karte hain die casted lock.
Executive: Achcha sirf aluminium mein aap karte ho.
Customer: Haan haan to ye nahi kar sakte apan.
Executive: Okay okay okay to mera kehne ka matlab yahi hai ki aap recent mein hi rahiyega aur recent mein hi by lead wagera aap refresh karte rahiyega.
Customer: Right achcha to jitni jyada by lead jaise hi by lead aayegi na wo by lead automatically aapka ho jayega.
Executive: Achcha achcha to aap jitni jyada by lead karoge kabhi kabhi kya hota hai sir malum hai kya wo pehle kuch ghanto mein aake gayi hui rehti hai wo to der se wo by lead mujhe milti hai to uske liye kuch kar sakte hain kya kyuki nahi nahi wahi maine bola na recent pe aap karoge na recent pe jab aap click karoge na to recent pe according to time aata hai.
Customer: Hmm right ki hamare paas ek minute pehle aayi ek ghante pehle aayi do ghante pehle aayi to according to time waha pe available rehta hai.
Executive: Hmm right hmm to recent mein wo dikkat nahi aayegi jo bhi by lead aayegi na aap dekhiye yaha pe jo bhi by lead aapko dikh rahi hai ek ghante pehle aadhe ghante pehle right ha hai na hai na to us accordingly aapko waha pe dikhti hai aur uske alava agar aapko koi aur by lead chahiye to sabse upar mein na ek search ka option hoga.
Customer: Search ha ha search wo malum hai wo malum hai to waha pe specifically aap keyword dal dijiyega aur waha se aapko search ka option mein aana shuru ho jayega.
Executive: Achcha sir theek hai okay okay baki aap hame catalog wagera dijiye reviews wagera ka sir dhyan rakhiyega kisi bhi customer se aap baat karte hain to please unko boliyega ki wo reviews wagera wo kar de.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Baki kisi tarah ki koi dikkat hoti hai to please aap hame batayega to sir aapka na ye concern open ho gaya tha to main ye concern close kar raha hun aapke paas mein fir se feedback ke liye jayega please is bari sir satisfied pe click kijiye ga.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai aapke mail pe aur app pe dono pe jayega abhi pa minute mein jayega theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir main aapko apna number whatsapp bhi kar deta hun kabhi koi dikkat hogi sir to please aap hame reach out kar lijiyega.
Customer: Haan sir aapka naam bhi dal dijiyega mera naam Roshan hai sir.
Executive: Okay okay okay thank you sir have a good day.
Customer: Thank you sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received 'not satisfied' feedback link.

- Customer is not getting enough orders.

- Customer's profile has out-of-stock products.

- Customer needs to update product images and price.

- Customer wants to receive buyleads faster.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the feedback was a mistake.

- Executive explained how to use recent buyleads.

- Executive explained how to search for specific buyleads.

- Executive requested updated catalog and customer reviews.

- Executive closed the customer's concern.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will WhatsApp his contact number.

- Customer will receive a feedback link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, profile update, catalog, reviews
